title: Top Places to visit in Kovvur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Kovvur is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Kovvur Mandal in Kovvur revenue division.

Top Places to visit in Mandapeta, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Mandapeta, also called Mandavyapuram is a town and an A-grade municipality in East Godavari district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a market place and a place of recreation for many surrounding villages and it is famous for its rice mills.

title: Top Places to visit in Nagari, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Nagari is a town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Nagari Mandal in the Chittoor revenue division.

Top Places to visit in Narasapuram, Andhra Pradesh
content: Narasapuram (or Narsapur) is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Narsipatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Narsipatnam is a town in the Visakhapatnam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It was upgraded by a gram panchayat into a municipality in 2012. title: Top Places to visit in Nidadavole, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Nidadavolu is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Nidadavolu Mandal in Kovvur revenue division.
